#summary Short instructions how to install the MetaEdit+ plugin for Eclipse.

= Download and install Eclipse =

Download [http://eclipse.org/ Eclipse] (Classic or IDE for Java Developers should be fine). Look for instructions how to install Eclipse to your computer.


= Installing the plugin =

Download the plugin as a single JAR-file from [http://code.google.com/p/metaedit-plugin-for-eclipse/downloads/list Downloads] page. Place it to plugins folder under Eclipse installation folder.
